response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product I have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and significance, tailored specifically to meet your needs and desires. Given its exceptional worth to you, which stands at $15,000, I am extending this exclusive offer with a strategic proposition. For a limited time, I am willing to consider a transaction at a price of $12,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true value, allowing you to acquire it at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial planning. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
